pages.title: Vampire Werewolves
pages.text: While not commot, it is possible for a vampire to become a lycanthrope. Such creature gains most of the strength and weaknesses of both traits. A vampire cannot use its power while in $(l:observations/lycanthropy#wolf_form)Wolf$(/l) or $(l:observations/lycanthropy#wolfman_form)Wolfman$(/l) forms. Feeding upon corpses as a wolf will not recover the vampire's hunger, and drinking blood remains the only way.

The vampire also loses its immunity to silver, and makes the werewolf vulnerable to fire and sunlight.$(p)The blood storage capacity is also reduced by a third with respect to a pure vampire creature.
